function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 due to lack of multi-disciplinary collaboration","Impact":"Increase in COVID-19 cases and challenges in controlling the pandemic","Mitigation":"Encourage collaboration across disciplines, share data and insights, and implement coordinated public health measures","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms, data sharing and analysis tools","People":"Public health officials, data scientists, AI experts, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Privacy and security risks in cloud-assisted wastewater management system","Impact":"Potential breaches of sensitive data and privacy violations","Mitigation":"Implement robust data encryption, access control measures, and regular security audits","Technologies":"Data encryption, access control systems, security auditing tools","People":"Wastewater management authorities, data security experts, IT professionals","Owner":"Wastewater management authorities, IT departments"},{"Description":"Spread of water-borne diseases due to ineffective water quality management","Impact":"Health risks from contaminated water, potential disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement advanced water quality monitoring systems, data analytics for identifying contamination, and proactive maintenance of water infrastructure","Technologies":"Sensors, data analytics tools, predictive maintenance technology","People":"Water management authorities, public health officials, data scientists","Owner":"Water management authorities, public health organizations"}]}
